Detailed Description

File based persistence of the multi-paged bitmap document.

Document persistence is realized as a list of bitmap files (for each document page) and meta info description file. There are three operating modes for this component (controlled by component attribute 'OpeationMode'): 1. Page bitmaps and meta info are saved in the target directory with following naming convention: <DocumentFileName>_[PageIndex].<DocumentExtension> for bitmap pages and <DocumentFileName>.bdm for the document's meta info. 2. All files (page bitmaps and meta info) are saved in the document's own directory with the same name as a document file name: <DocumentFileName>.bid 3. The same as 2. but the document's directory will be zipped.

const QString *  filePathPtr = NULL,
int  flags = -1,
bool  beQuiet = true 
) const [virtual]

Returns true if object dataObject can be loaded/saved.

Parameters:
dataObjectPtroptional pointer to data object should be loaded/stored. It can be NULL if any object is meant.
filePathPtroptional pointer to file should be loaded/stored. It can be NULL if any file is meant. If it points at empty string, anonymous loading is mean.
flagscombination of flags defined in QueryFlags and ifile::IFileTypeInfo::QueryFlags.
beQuietif true, no user message output is allowed.
